articles.description: Microsoft's Copilot is groundbreaking, and yet, I'm really not that eager to start using it.
articles.content: A lot of Microsoft’s September event was dedicated to Copilot, Bing Chat, and other AI-driven features. In a way, the updates made to laptops like the Surface Laptop Studio 2 almost felt like an afte… [+6934 chars]
